titleStmt.title: [The case & usage of Mr. Edw. Bagshaw, drawn up by himself, the night before he was to have been sent away, being March 10. 1663/4. With an account of his examination before the King.]
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: Copy catalogued lacking t.p.; title and imprint from NUC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
